about_the_game:
"The Fading of Nicole Wilson" is a story-driven, folk-horror adventure game dealing with topics like authenticity, personal sacrifice and the cost of fitting in while daring players to unravel a dark, thrilling mystery.

Brit, a teenager feeling left behind in her backwater hometown, lands a ghost-hunting job at the secluded Timberline Hotel. She hopes to capture footage that will make her famous. But when her employer is hospitalized, Brit must handle the investigation alone.

As she arrives at the desolate, crumbling estate, Brit quickly realizes there are more dangerous forces at play than any supernatural entity.

Equipped with her camera and an array of ghost-hunting gear, she descends into the hotel's shadowy corridors, determined to uncover its secrets. However, her investigation takes an unexpected turn as she discovers a web of unsettling clues hinting at a far more sinister truth hidden within the hotel's history that has never been told before.

  • A narrative adventure game combining exploration, puzzle solving and investigation
  • Explore beautiful and haunting locations in Lewis & Clark County, uncovering Helena’s grim, secret truth
  • Binaural audio for a truly immersive experience
  • Intriguing, touching and adult storytelling, combining mystery with a folk horror
  • Flawed, relatable characters confronting a net of schemes and lies

content_descriptors.notes: Contains mature subject matter in story and dialog

short_description: Feeling stuck in her backwater hometown, Brit jumps at the chance for a life-changing adventure at the derelict Timberline Hotel. Her chance of a quick rise to fame, however, soon turns into a grim investigation as both the living and the dead are hiding dark secrets behind its abandoned walls.
